name: Restricted Square
description:
A very simple "game" I made to raise awareness on the situation in Palestine

In the game, there are stars behind you, which represent the rights of the Palestinians and there are certain blocks  which are pink-like and you have to try not to collide with them and you can think of the blue block as you or a Palestinian who has to try their best in avoiding the pink-like blocks and you can only move around the place which has the pink stars, why? Because that is the only place you can call home.

- Controls:

  • Arrow Keys to move
  • Spacebar to restart game 

- Assets

  • Font from: https://managore.itch.io/m5x7

Note: The text takes some time to appear.. so be patient when the game starts

Made using C & SDL2
